clinical_study.brief_title: Paraprofessional Treatment of Depression in Vietnam
clinical_study.official_title: Paraprofessional Treatment of Depression in Vietnam

brief_summary.textblock: Trained para-professional health care workers will implement a stepped-care model of depression care in commune health stations in Vietnam.

detailed_description.textblock: This project focuses on evaluation of a collaborative care system for treatment of depression in Vietnam. This system involves training para-professional health care workers in a stepped-care model system of depression care to be implemented in commune health stations in Vietnam.

primary_outcome.measure: Change across time (random effects slope) in depressive symptoms, as assessed by the PHQ-9 questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: The PHQ-9 (Patient Health Questionnaire-9) assesses depressive symptoms, over the last two weeks. It is assessed at 0, 6, 12, 24 weeks. The outcome target is the linear and quadratic change slopes across these 4 time points.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change across time (random effects slope) in anxiety symptoms, as assessed by the GAD-7 questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: The GAD-7 (General Anxiety Disorder-7) assesses anxiety symptoms, over the last two weeks. It is assessed at 0, 6, 12, 24 weeks. The outcome target is the linear and quadratic change slopes across these 4 time points.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change across time (random effects slope) in physical health, as assessed by the SF-12 questionnaire, Physical Health subscale
secondary_outcome.description: The SF-12 questionnaire, Physical Health subscale, assesses physical health functioning. It is assessed at 0, 6, 12, 24 weeks. The outcome target is the linear and quadratic change slopes across these 4 time points.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change across time (random effects slope) in mental health, as assessed by the SF-12 questionnaire, Mental Health subscale
secondary_outcome.description: The SF-12 questionnaire, Mental Health subscale, assesses mental health functioning. It is assessed at 0, 6, 12, 24 weeks. The outcome target is the linear and quadratic change slopes across these 4 time points.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change across time (random effects slope) in behavioral activation skills and behaviors, as assessed by the BADS questionnaire.
secondary_outcome.description: The BADS (Behavioral Activation for Depression Scale) questionnaire assesses behavioral activation-related skills and behaviors. It is assessed at 0, 6, 12, 24 weeks. The outcome target is the linear and quadratic change slopes across these 4 time points.

secondary_outcome.measure: "Substantial improvement" in depressive symptoms, as assessed by the PHQ-9
secondary_outcome.description: Rates of substantial symptomatic improvement (50% or greater reduction in PHQ-9 scores from baseline), to (a) 6 weeks, (b) 12 weeks, (c) 24 weeks.

secondary_outcome.measure: "Depression remission", as assessed by the PHQ-9
secondary_outcome.description: Depression remission (PHQ-9<5), at (a) 6 weeks, (b) 12 weeks, (c) 24 weeks.

arm_group.description: Guideline Antidepressant Medication, following the VN National Mental Health plan.
Psychoeducation, behavioral activation therapy, and medication delivered within a collaborative care model.

intervention.description: Psychoeducation, behavioral activation therapy, and medication delivered within a collaborative care model.
Guideline Antidepressant Medication, following the VN National Mental Health plan.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Age >=18
2. Depression Diagnosis
Exclusion Criteria: active psychosis, mania, substance abuse, suicidal behaviors, cognitive impairment.
